metadata.title: CVE-2023-3268 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An out of bounds (OOB) memory access flaw was found in the Linux kernel inrelay_file_read_start_pos in kernel/relay.c in the relayfs. This flaw couldallow a local attacker to crash the system or leak kernel internalinformation.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-3268` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-5.4.0-162-generic - 5.4.0-162.179
linux-image-5.4.0-162-generic-lpae - 5.4.0-162.179
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-162-generic - 5.4.0-162.179
linux-image-unsigned-5.4.0-162-lowlatency - 5.4.0-162.179
No subscription required

linux-image-5.15.0-79-generic - 5.15.0-79.86~20.04.2
